short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Passively learn a new language every time you open a new tab.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
A simple and effective supplementary tool for language learning!

Features:
✨ New word everyday
✨ Listen to the word in the chosen language
✨ New inspirational quote about learning
✨ Dark Interface
✨ Available in 24 languages
